tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I feel lucky living in Vasant Kunj because of close proximity and able to find a gem like Dr.Mamta Mishra. Not only me me but my baby feel connected to her voice and aura during those 9 months.
i am giving this feedback in two parts, one how she is as a person and another as a doctor.

Person:- I feel your behaviour matters when you are doctor, at the end they are also human being with medical gift. She is outrightly one of most modest person despite being so successful. I love the way she handles financial subjects very clear cut ,considerate and realist. You can ask and she will clarify all the financial queries of yours. Infact she will be considerate about your money and her response is so apt. She is practical and yet you are her precious patient whom she cares a lot. She has a bit of philosophical side which puts you at such a ease while talking to her

Doctor- complete knowledge about her field, you just have to ask the right question. I have visited her clinic mostly and fortis hospital in the 3rd trimester. During every visit she will do her observation with concentration then will give you time to ask your queries. I feel she finds her clinic very close to her heart and very caring in that space. She did forget me as a patient during the initial trimester but again cant pinpoint her for that. I liked her as a person and her positive aura as a doctor. I have understood her nature and showed my honest trust on her advice. 

Procedure: My 9 month of pregnancy was less complicated and same feeling was created by Dr. Mamta Mishra. There was subserosal fibroid but that didn‚Äôt interfere with pregnancy. I chose to  get delivered by Ma‚Äôam hence chose fortis as my delivery hospital. At the end there was slight issue of gestational diabetics which might have been resulted in insulin injection but not needed at the end. After 38 week I was given induced labor pain under the guidance of Mamta ma‚Äôam which was successful and i delivered a healthy baby after 12 hrs of induction process. There was flow of blood from Utreus after delivery whose reason was unknown. But ma‚Äôam was able to stop the blood flow and stopped the mishappening , the procedure took another 1 hr and episiotomy stitched given by ma‚Äôam was perfectly intact. I am writing this 1 week after my delivery. 

I would recommend every aspiring pregnant women to her for better guidance and relaxing 9 months. If any further information needed please reach out.

Thankyou Mamta Ma‚Äôam
Every meeting with you was soothing in its own way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from severe period pain due to endometriosis & Fibroids and was unable to conceive due to this disease.
I visited too many famous doctors in Delhi and NCR. They all mentioned that I will have to undergo an ‚ÄúOpen myomectomy‚Äù and may need to remove the uterus or ovary along with Fibroids & Endo, and the chances for pregnancy very low or no chances.
I was not in favour of open myomectomy and no one gave me a positive hope.

One of my friend asked me to visit Dr Mamta Mishra. And I thought lets just try for the last time before I decide.
Then I visited Dr Mamta and she reviewed all my ultrasound reports in detailed and provided me detailed information about the Endometriosis & Fibroids. I was so happy and positive to see how a busy doctor can spend so much time on your case. She mentioned that I have to undergo Endometriosis and fibroid removal surgery because the fibroids & Endo are too big in size and they are blocking my pregnancy. She said she will try for laparoscopic myomectomy but the chances are low. I was so positive with Dr Mamta and decided to get this surgery done. March 2021 was the month of my surgery, Dr Mamta tried her best and removed all my fibroids with ‚ÄúLaparoscopic Myomectomy‚Äù. The surgery took almost 6-7 hour but she spent her whole day on my surgery so that I don‚Äôt have to suffer with ‚ÄúOpen myomectomy‚Äù. After my surgery, she asked me to be positive for my pregnancy as she tried her best to not to touch my uterus, tubes and ovaries during suregry. 

In July 2021, I got pregnant naturally. ** **** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** *** ** ** **** *** I would highly recommend all to please do not loose hopes and must visit Dr Mamta Mishra before you decide anything. She is a life and dream saver!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Rather than review, we as couples would rather call it a note of gratitude for Dr. Mamta Mishra. If you want to trust the natural process of delivery, you will not find a doc as good as her. The pregnancy experience which she creates will have a life long impact on you as few things like ‚Äútrust your body‚Äù is very rare to come straight from doctor‚Äôs mouth. 

We had heard so much around pregnancy around us that we were actually afraid if we will be able to manage that. But her simple advices, 24/7 availability for your problems, calm and composed approch to your issues, her motivation in labor room and no extra expense are just few to state.

Only doc I have visited recently who does not have any tie up with any lab and you can get your tests done anywhere you want, No issues of medicines being available at a particular shop (you will easily get anywhere and they are not expensive), no supplements till it is actually required as she will motivate you to get those from natural food are again just few things you will love about her.

It would not have been possible for us to have such a smooth vaginal delivery experience without her.

Do visit her for a stress free and pocket friendly delivery experience.

Regards 
Proud parents of Vedant Singh

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Mamta Mishra for pregnancy checkup.Dr. mamta is highly professional, very confident, thoroughly updated and a wonderful doctor. she is very straight forward in her consultations and explains the process, the risks and will recommend the best.She never forces her opinion Like she asked me what delivery method will I prefer. She encourages for normal delivery if it is medically safe and if not she will recommend a caesarian. She is not biased.In my case she put in all efforts to deliver my baby normally and after putting in all time and effort when baby was still not coming she swiftly went and prepared the operation theatre for emergency caesarian. She did not jump to doing caesarian without trying nor did she delay when she knew cesarian was inevitable.Another good thing is She always responds to all telephonic conversations despite her busy schedule. She will see the reports online and respond even at odd hours and won't ask you to come to clinic unnecessarily.I am extremely thankful to Dr. Mamta for making the process so smooth for me .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After 33 weeks of pregnancy¬† and having not so good experience with our present gynae, we started looking for someone who is experienced and who we can trust at this stage.One of my colleagues suggested us to go to Dr. Mamta Mishra and after meeting Mam for the first time we were so relieved and confident. 

My wife was suffering from GDM and she was on metformin.Madam told us not to worry much and eat freely and keep on monitoring sugar levels.After that we did not worry and by God's grace sugar remained in control and finally we gave birth to a baby boy with normal delivery. 

Qualities which we like most about Dr. Mamta Mishra are as follows:
a) She is straightforward and never tried to be extra sweet or strict.After talking with her we always have clarity and built a trust on her.
b) She always tries her level best for normal delivery and always encouraged us to have patience.
c) She is very experienced and clarified every doubts we ever asked.
d) During labour and after delivery provided full guidance and support.Thanks to Fortis Vasant Kunj staff also. 

We are thankful to God that at right time we met Dr. Mamta Mishra and everything went smoothly after that. 

Thank you so much Madam!!!!We will always be obliged to you. 

Proud Parents
Neha Tanwar and Shakti Singh

review:
It was a great experienced for me and my family. I have 1 daughter and 1 son and Mamta ma‚Äôam carefully take care and advised everything and always ready to advised precautions and remedies. Really Really appreciate her dedication for the patients. For those who are looking for a best gynaecologist in Delhi NCR, then Please take appointment for a day and you will get to know. 

‚ÄúThanks Ma‚Äôam for all your care for my Family and Happy New Year‚Äù

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were looking for a Gynaecologist in South Delhi and i find myself blessed to have come across Mamta ma'am through practo. We visited her at the Fortis Hospital and were comfortable to continue our journey with her. i was very keen to have a normal delivery and with ma'am we were able to achieve it.  She is supportive friendly and available on calls 24X7 which gives the patient so much confidence. I had to run to the doctor midnight and she was available on calls even then. very grateful for ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was looking for a reliable and expert gynaecologist and her name came up on the searches. Read so many wonderful reviews about her that I was convinced to meet Dr. Mamta. She truly is a wonderful doctor, who puts you at ease, discusses things objectively, mentions all options at hand, and has a wonderful aura. I have visited her twice so far and feel that I‚Äôm in good hands. :) She‚Äôs been very patient with me and has answered all my queries. I‚Äôll be sticking to her and would strongly recommend her to anyone in search of a good gynaecologist in Delhi NCR.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,
review: Visited Dr. Mamta Mishra for advice as I was not able to conceive. She asked for couple of check ups and advised to try it naturally as nothing seemed wrong in the reports. Asked to spend time with the partner (we met on weekends only due to work). We still asked her if we could go for any alternate way. She explained in details about the other ways and clearly stated the success rate , she calmed us and pursued us to try it naturally. All went well by Gods grace and I delivered a healthy baby. She has always been very helpful like a guardian pre , during and post pregnancy. These days hardly you get to meet such Doctors who are ethical in their approach. We thank God for providing us the wisdom to approach Dr. Mamta Mishra.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Tests,
review: Consulted Dr Mamta Mishra from the start of my pregnancy *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** *** ****She not only makes you comfortable but also gives you a very clear picture about your pregnancy. If its possible she will try her best for a normal delivery.I had myself given up in the labour room and requested her for a c-section but she denied that and encouraged me for a normal delivery. In the end, due to her support n encouragement I was able to deliver the baby normal. This is very much unlike the current scenario where the Doctors are very willing to go for a c section.I would highly recommend her as a Gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dear Mam,

Thank you so much for being such an amazing doctor since January to me. I have never seen such a supportive and positive doctor ever.

I have been told by many people that always choose best doctor for yourself because it is very imp for our health.

When I became pregnant ü§∞, my sister in law told me about you because both her cases has done by you and you handled them so well.

Many people has shared their experiences with me that their doctor was not good and they were not satisfied with their service and from their treatment.


Me and My husband as parents chose you as a Doctor for our baby. I had no trust on any other doctor as I was looking for good and skilled doctor. I got you and I have never seen such a friendly and brilliant doctor as you are.

Thank you once again Mamta Mishra Mam for being an amazing Doctor in my tough journey and I will recommend your name to my known people as well.


From Baby - Thank you Doctor for being an excellent Doctor to my parents and I am thankful to god and you for helping me to come in this world without any problem.


I want to advise everyone that must visit atleast for once to Mamta Mishra Mam and make your pregnancy journey positive and stress free ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëç

With love,
From Shivani (Mother) 
From Baby (Nakshatra).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited mam's clinic for my wife's pregnancy checkup, though due to some constraints we have not get the delivery done but the way she explains the situation and talk about health factors is truly awesome. Must recommend specially If you are living near to her or in South Delhi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were very lucky to find Dr. Mamta Mishra who made our parenthood blessful. She is such an experienced Gynecologist. I had placenta previa  which is a high risk pregnancy but under the guidance of Dr. Mamta Mishra it went very smooth. She treats her patients with compassion and cares about them. We visited her clinic in Vasant Kunj every month and apart from that she is always available over phone for any guidance. Even she calls back as well. We are thankful to her for making our pregnancy journey pleasant and safe. We would highly recommend her.

*** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** She does not suggest unnecessary tests and medicines. She has provided us the best couslling and cleared all our doubts regarding pregnancy planning. I strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My baby could survive because Dr Mamta discovered the sac at the right time. She is a very friendly and understanding doctor.

Dr Mamta Mishra is an extremely professional, experienced and friendly doctor. She takes time to explain all the options in details to her patients. Highly recommend.
